title: Sans Serif text
content:
Is this one or 2 fonts? especially looking at the question mark in the first sentence

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725134003im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-3_4719.jpg)
author: email.mbs

comments.content: I know it looks close but the M is too pointy at the top. I don't think its Futura.

> I know it looks close but the M is too pointy at the top. I don't think its Futura.

Have a look to the heavier weights of Futura and you'll see /M is not pointy.
